ygData.subject: The Commander Joins The Fight!
ygData.msgSnippet: * Iron Raptor, looks down at the ground as Prowl slows down for her, seeing the battle all around the Cybertronian Fire. Alliance and Maximals everywhere! She

* Iron Raptor, looks down at the ground as Prowl slows down for her, seeing 
the battle all around the Cybertronian Fire.
Alliance and Maximals everywhere!
She sighed, her helm moving up and over her face, her hair disappearing 
inside of it.
Ready for battle!
But she looks up at Prowl.
< I will be. You be careful too.>
And with that she felt Prowls arms open, looking down at the ground as she 
dropps a short way before landing on her feet, looking at the battle from 
this new view point,finding that she could see quite well through her helm.
Her cape flew behind  her slightly, then looking down at the little creature 
in her hands.*

" Remember, into the compartment."

*And with that she moved the little guy up over her shoulder, opening a 
little compartment in her back armor, where the blade of her sword was 
mostly held.She tipped her hand so that he would tumble in.
Her other hand moving up to take hold of the handle of her sword, sliding it 
out and holding it at the ready while she straightened up and looked towards 
the battle.
Hopefully the little ball-o-fuzz wouldn't find the ride too bumpy.
< I'll remember that.>She replied to Prowl quickly.
With that Iron Raptor steadied herself out and then began to run towards the 
battle, since Prowl had dropped her off a few hundred meters from it.
With the added armor her body felt heavy and her legs had to work hard, her 
feet pounding against the ground as she ran.
With her sword in had Iron Raptor looked for a target, seeing one which 
seemed a good enough one to her.
After watching Astral fire off missials at the CF, she decided that he would 
be her first victom to taste her new power.
Iron Raptor snarled as she brought her sword back, the blade glowing for a 
second before bringing it down, an energy slash sent towards Astral's 
torso.*
